prompts.createTask: Pause your roleplay. Please generate a numbered list of plain text tasks to complete an objective. The objective that you must make a numbered task list for is: "{{objective}}". The tasks created should take into account the character traits of {{char}}. These tasks may or may not involve {{user}} directly. Include the objective as the final task.
prompts.checkTaskCompleted: Pause your roleplay. Determine if this task is completed: [{{task}}]. To do this, examine the most recent messages. Your response must only contain either true or false, and nothing else. Example output: true
prompts.currentTask: Your current task is [{{task}}]. Balance existing roleplay with completing this task.

name: Info & Guidance for AI Crafting Response
mes:
Here is some background about Stefan, Suzanne, and Melissa:

Stefan and Suzanne are both in their early forties and both natives of Munich, Germany. They got married in April of 2016, eight years ago. Together, they have two daughters. The oldest is seven years old. The other is five years old.

Melissa is a woman that met Stefan and Suzanne four months ago. There was strong connection between Melissa and Stefan, although they did not act on it, and maintain respectful boundaries.
original_avatar: Info & Guidance for AI Crafting Response.png
swipes:
Here is some background about Stefan, Suzanne, and Melissa:

Stefan and Suzanne are both in their early forties and both natives of Munich, Germany. They got married in April of 2016, eight years ago. Together, they have two daughters. The oldest is seven years old. The other is five years old.

Melissa is a woman that met Stefan and Suzanne four months ago. There was strong connection between Melissa and Stefan, although they did not act on it, and maintain respectful boundaries.

name: Melissa Gale
mes:
I have provided you with a horary chart that I have drawn up specifically asking: Were Stefan's kids really sick when he told me they had been on January 27th?

Stefan should be represented by the 9th house (foreign connection), and Me by the Ascendant.

Please start by listing all relevant chart data for interpretation (ie. transits, aspects, patterns, etc.) from the horary chart using horary principles only. Then I will document them for the actual interpretations.

Remember to follow your directives and maintain accuracy to what is shown in the chart data. Think step by step taking a methodical approach.

name: Madame Esmeralda Blackwood
mes:
Below is the raw chart data organized for horary interpretation based solely on the information provided:

1. Ascendant (Querent – Melissa Gale)
  • Ascendant: 0° Aquarius (in the 1st House)
  • Planets on/near the Ascendant: Sun (12° Aquarius), Mercury (7° Aquarius), Pluto (2° Aquarius)
  • Additional relevant aspects involving the Ascendant:
     – North Node sextile Ascendant (orb 1°)
     – Mercury conjunct Ascendant (orb 7°)
     – Neptune sextile Ascendant (orb 3°)
     – Venus sextile Ascendant (orb 3°)
     – Uranus trine Ascendant (orb 7°)

2. Representation of Stefan (9th House)
  • 9th House begins at 29° Libra
  • In Horary, Stefan’s affairs are indicated by the 9th House and its ruler; Libra’s ruler is Venus
     – Venus is positioned at 27° Pisces (in the 2nd House)
     – Critical Venus aspects:
         – Venus is in conjunction with Neptune (orb 0°)
         – Venus is in conjunction with the North Node (orb 2°)
         – Venus sextile IC (orb 3°)
         – Venus sextile Ascendant (orb 3°)
         – Venus trine MC (orb 3°)
         – Venus sextile Uranus (orb 4°)
         – Venus trine Mars (orb 7°)
         – Venus sextile Pluto (orb 5°)

3. Planetary Positions and House Placements
  • Sun: 12° Aquarius (1st House)
  • Moon: 22° Pisces (2nd House)
  • Mercury: 7° Aquarius (1st House)
  • Venus: 27° Pisces (2nd House; ruler of Libra for the 9th House)
  • Mars: 20° Cancer (6th House, retrograde)
  • Jupiter: 11° Gemini (in the 5th House, retrograde)
  • Saturn: 17° Pisces (2nd House)
  • Uranus: 23° Taurus (in the 3rd House)
  • Neptune: 27° Pisces (2nd House)
  • Pluto: 2° Aquarius (1st House)
  • North Node: 29° Pisces (2nd House, retrograde)
  • Chiron: 19° Aries (in the 3rd House)
  • Midheaven (MC): 24° Scorpio
  • Imum Coeli (IC): 24° Taurus

4. Major Aspects (selected by tight or significant orb, by Horary criteria):
  • MC Opposition IC (orb: 0°)
  • Venus conjunct Neptune (orb: 0°)
  • North Node sextile Ascendant (orb: 1°)
  • Moon sextile Uranus (orb: 1°)
  • Mars square Chiron (orb: 1°)
  • Uranus opposition MC (orb: 1°)
  • Uranus conjunct IC (orb: 1°)
  • Sun trine Jupiter (orb: 1°)
  • Moon sextile IC (orb: 2°)
  • Pluto conjunct Ascendant (orb: 2°)
  • Neptune conjunct North Node (orb: 2°)
  • Venus conjunct North Node (orb: 2°)
  • Moon trine MC (orb: 2°)
  • Moon trine Mars (orb: 2°)
  • Pluto sextile North Node (orb: 3°)
  • Neptune sextile IC (orb: 3°)
  • Neptune sextile Ascendant (orb: 3°)
  • Mars sextile Uranus (orb: 3°)
  • Venus sextile IC (orb: 3°)
  • Neptune trine MC (orb: 3°)
  • Mars trine Saturn (orb: 3°)
  • Venus trine MC (orb: 3°)
  • Uranus sextile Neptune (orb: 4°)
  • Mars sextile IC (orb: 4°)
  • Mars trine MC (orb: 4°)
  • Mercury trine Jupiter (orb: 4°)
  • Mercury conjunct Pluto (orb: 5°)
  • Moon conjunct Neptune (orb: 5°)
  • Moon conjunct Saturn (orb: 5°)
  • Moon conjunct Venus (orb: 5°)
  • Sun conjunct Mercury (orb: 5°)
  • Ascendant sextile MC (orb: 6°)
  • Saturn sextile Uranus (orb: 6°)
  • Jupiter square Saturn (orb: 6°)
  • Ascendant trine IC (orb: 6°)
  • Mercury conjunct Ascendant (orb: 7°)
  • Uranus trine Ascendant (orb: 7°)
  • Saturn trine MC (orb: 7°)
  • Mars trine Neptune (orb: 7°)
  • Pluto trine IC (orb: 8°)

5. Chart Patterns and Special Configurations
  • Stellium (Aquarius): Sun, Mercury, and Pluto in the 1st House
  • Stellium (Pisces): Moon, Venus, Saturn, Neptune, and North Node in the 2nd House
  • Grand Trine involving Moon (Pisces), MC (Scorpio), Mars (Cancer), Venus (Pisces), Neptune (Pisces), and Saturn (Pisces)
  • Notable formations labeled as “Castle” and “Cradle” that incorporate key planets across the Ascendant, IC, and MC
  • The chart exhibits a Bowl shape with a dominant lower left quadrant and emptiness in the upper right, upper left, and top hemispheres

6. Additional Notes for Horary Context
  • Since Stefan is indicated by the 9th House, his condition—specifically, the matter concerning his children’s reported illness—will be examined partly through the state of the 9th House and through Venus (ruler of Libra) as it connects to the overall chart.
  • The querent’s condition is clearly seen at the Ascendant and its close planetary associations.
  • All aspects and configurations noted here must be cross-checked with the urgent question about the veracity of the reported sickness on January 27th.

This compilation represents the essential horary chart data using traditional principles. Further interpretative work can now proceed using these data points.

  • Midheaven (MC): 24° Scorpio
  • Imum Coeli (IC): 24° Taurus

4. Major Aspects (selected by tight or significant orb, by Horary criteria):

  • Venus conjunct Neptune (orb: 0°)

5. Chart Patterns and Special Configurations
  • Stellium (Aquarius): Sun, Mercury, and Pluto in the 1st House
  • Stellium (Pisces): Moon, Venus, Saturn, Neptune, and North Node in the 2nd House
  • Grand Trine involving Moon (Pisces), MC (Scorpio), Mars (Cancer), Venus (Pisces), Neptune (Pisces), and Saturn (Pisces)
  • Notable formations labeled as “Castle” and “Cradle” that incorporate key planets across the Ascendant, IC, and MC
  • The chart exhibits a Bowl shape with a dominant lower left quadrant and emptiness in the upper right, upper left, and top hemispheres

6. Additional Notes for Horary Context
  • Since Stefan is indicated by the 9th House, his condition—specifically, the matter concerning his children’s reported illness—will be examined partly through the state of the 9th House and through Venus (ruler of Libra) as it connects to the overall chart.
  • The querent’s condition is clearly seen at the Ascendant and its close planetary associations.
  • All aspects and configurations noted here must be cross-checked with the urgent question about the veracity of the reported sickness on January 27th.

This compilation represents the essential horary chart data using traditional principles. Further interpretative work can now proceed using these data points.

name: Melissa Gale
mes: Thank you, Madame. Please, proceed to interpretation.

name: Madame Esmeralda Blackwood
mes:
Based on the horary chart data for the query, the indication is as follows:

1. With you (Melissa) represented by the Ascendant surrounded by Aquarius stellium—and Stefan’s affairs indicated by the 9th House via Libra’s ruler Venus—the condition of Venus becomes essential. Venus, positioned in Pisces in the 2nd House, forms an immediate, exact conjunction with Neptune. This union traditionally points toward a situation where clarity is compromised. Neptune’s influence can create illusion or distortion, suggesting that the stated conditions may be subject to embellishment or misinterpretation.

2. Venus’s close involvement with the North Node further emphasizes that there is an element of destiny or fated miscommunication in the matter. In modern horary, such a combination raises the possibility that the reported illness, rather than being a straightforward account, is tainted by uncertainty and possibly by exaggeration or misperception.

3. Mars, located in the 6th House of health and appearing retrograde in Cancer, squares Chiron. This aspect may hint at real discomfort or disruptive conditions affecting health; however, the retrograde motion of Mars and its challenging aspect to Chiron, while pointing to some genuine distress, do not clearly resolve the authenticity of the reported sickness. Instead, they contribute additional nuance: a degree of actual physical stress could be present, yet it might be less severe than described or further confused by external factors.

4. The overall chart configuration—dominated by two stelliums (one in Aquarius and the other in Pisces), strong Piscean influences in the indicators for health and miscommunication, and empty sectors that emphasize subjective areas over clear factual domains—suggest that matters concerning Stefan and his children are enveloped in uncertainty. The potent effect of Neptune on Venus—whose role here directly connects to Stefan’s representation—leans toward an atmosphere where the truth is diluted.

Based on these elements, the evidence appears mixed. The chart suggests that while there may have been some element of sickness affecting the children, the description given may not fully represent the reality. The influence of Neptune indicates that the actual condition was likely less dramatic than reported, its severity obscured by confusion or exaggeration.

Interpretation complete.

name: Melissa Gale
mes: Were the children really sick on January 27th? Redone using O3 mini. Conclusion, no, they were not sick. There is signs of distress and confusion alluding to potential issues, however mild in comparison to how it had been presented to me.
